title: can trickster NOT make fizz immune to tower shots?
body:
i don't care about everything else, but im really sick of seeing fizz Q+W+aa and do 30% of my hp under tower while taking 0 damage because he mashed e real fast before the turret shot could hit him.. 

he's the only champion in the game who doesn't give a shit about towers after lvl 3.

replies.body: {{champion:78}} towers oh you mean the tickling things.
9/10 sure this is a yasuo main.

was my request really that unreasonable? does anyone enjoy running into him toplane? im not asking to gut his damage or anything. just take away the bs "no consequences ever unless im retarded and don't know how to play" playstyle
Yes, you are not even lvl 30. You are just circle jerking for likes and have no idea what you are talking about.

> [{quoted}](name=PitchBlack4,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UZbldLI9,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-05-07T22:35:13.255+0000)
>
> Yes, you are not even lvl 30. You are just circle jerking for likes and have no idea what you are talking about.

yeah because smurf accounts aren't a thing dude.

who's the one circlejerking?  

HURR HURR UR LEVEL BRO THEREFORE WHO CARES WHAT YOU SAY

nevermind that his base damages are fucking insane, and my ONLY grip about fizz is the fact that he can chunk me for 40% of my hp in lane against him with no risk, and can do the exact same thing under tower as soon as he hits 3. he doesn't even need a minion wave to do it. just Q+W, then e out of there and boom i can't do shit except watch as he leaves with little to no damage taken, while im missing 40% of my hp

god you types of people are the worst.

i bet you're the guy in a game who does some stupid shit, gets killed, and then when other teammates tell you to be more careful you respond with "HAHA STFU X RANK, IM Y RANK AND YOU CAN'T TELL ME WHAT TO DO" as you continue feeding and being shit.

Oh yea I'm totally shit. What are you smurf from silver?

If you are dying to a Fizz lvl 3 then you really don't know how to play. No one can dive under tower lvl 3, especially when they need to wait 2 sec for w to get ready.

Also Fizz is one of the most risky midlaners in the game, with 0 ranged abilities, 0 sustain, and a farming tool that costs mana to use (Annie has the same thing but ranged and refunds full mana). He needs to q into your face and wait for 2 seconds before being able to do dmg. Try building defensive next time, you know against an assassin who is meant to kill you in lane.

Next time shitpost from your main account, might give you some credibility. Or is this better than it.
